You feel the forces of the wild stir your soul, granting you extra insights into nature, heartier defenses, and an ability to manipulate both friends and foes in a battle.

Constant Benefits: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Nature checks. Each time you fail a saving throw, you gain a +2 bonus to the next saving throw you make against that effect.
